scripts.test: npm run build && esbuild test/index.ts --platform=node --format=esm --keep-names --bundle | node --input-type=module | tap-arc
scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run build-cjs && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.changelog: auto-changelog --template keepachangelog --breaking-pattern 'BREAKING CHANGE' && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'changelog'
scripts.postversion: npm run changelog && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
